commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh? The corridor's pitch black.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Is this part of the atmosphere for the attraction?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah. It's an important part of the attraction to make sure you all enjoy it.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Just the fact that it's dark kinda makes my heart pound.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Y-Yeah.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Guys, relax! Dark or not, we won't be getting lost as long as I'm around!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It's so reassuring to have you here with us, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: However, there's one thing I'd like you to promise me. I want you all to tell me all of your tips and tricks as school idols as thanks for helping you guys through this!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Our tips and tricks? That wouldn't be an issue at all, but what would you do with that knowledge?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Um, how do I put this? I'm trying to, like, research into pushing the limits of being a school idol.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Or so I'll lead you to believe! I just wanna find out all your secrets so I can be an even more hyper-miraculous, cute school idol than I already am!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: GYAHHH!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Ack! What's wrong?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Th-Th-There was some kind of...weird noise just now. Was it a noise? I think it might've been a voice?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: A voice? Did everyone hear it?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: No, I heard nothing.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It sounded like a kid's voice! Like it was calling out for help or something.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: S-Stop saying such scary things, Kas...

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Eeeeeek!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Ruby?!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I-I heard it! I heard a voice just now. An old woman calling out for help, telling us not to go! Can't you guys hear anything?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm using a super-directional speaker right now to output voices to specific people.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I made this speaker myself. Rina-chan Board says, "Mehehe."

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! YOU were doing that?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yup. I'm glad it worked. This attraction's got potential. Rina-chan Board says, "Sparkle."

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Is it possible that this attraction is...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I don't think it is merely possible. I am certain of it.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It did kinda occur to me when I saw the dark corridor. But is that really it?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Whimper* No way. Rina, this attraction you wanted us to help you out with. Is it actually a...um...you know? Ghost-related...thing?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yup. It's a haunted house.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I got hold of the latest technology in an effort to create an experience more realistic than ever.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: NOOOO!!!
